title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 85.13 - Children and youth with special health care needs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 85.13 - Children and youth with special health care needs

State Regulations

For persons under the age of 21 years having conditions covered under the scope of the children and youth with special health care needs support services program, all determinations of coverability in this Part shall be made by the children and youth with special health care needs support services program county medical director, the county commissioner of health or the health services administration of the City of New York as the designee of the Commissioner of Health. Such designee may utilize any diagnosis and evaluation carried out in a center approved by the children and youth with special health care needs support services program as the second opinion upon which determination of coverability is made, or may require an additional second opinion

Notes

York State Register May 12, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 19, eff. 5/12/2021

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
